price: 68. "I convey unto you the Messages of my Lord, and I am a trustworthy adviser (or well-wisher) for you.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
